article: Long time ago, there was a farmer who lived with his daughter. A young man fell in love with the farmer s beautiful daughter and wished to _ her. If you can _ the tail of any one of the three bulls, you can marry my daughter. _ , the young man got out and stood in the field, _ the first bull.
